https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/svedmfoPt8JgdWOIA1vHQB0rNzG.jpg A black and white silent short film, set on the Greek Cycladic island of Tenos. A woman in black is mourning inside a simple house. Reality blends with dreamy imagination, and tradition with insidious desires. Bleat
